attributes.action: remove the website God Hates Goths Website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This website advocates the use of torture against gothic children and is completely disgusting. This is not a decent website and is vastly wrong in it's facts. It turns my stomach and I'm sure it does of every other decent person on this earth. By all means check it out and then make your decision.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
